results.name: a(n) is the least k such that f(a(n-1)+1) + ... + f(k) > f(a(n-2)+1) + ... + f(a(n-1)) for n > 1, where f(n) = 1/(n+5) and a(1) = 1.
comment: Conjecture:  a(n) is linearly recurrent.  See A225918 for details.
example: Abbreviating this chain as b(1) = 1 < b(2) < b(3) < b(4) < ... < R = 2.912229..., it appears that lim_{n->infinity} b(n) = log(R) = 1.068918... .
